data.title: The Dreamboats
data.meta_description: Home page of The Dreamboats, a group from Mississauga, Canada. The Dreamboats are bringing back good ol' fashioned Rock n' Roll! Watch out for the spiked punch!
data.text:
We're so excited to announce that we've partnered with Ray-Ban Meta for their new Smart Glasses! We're going to be capturing a lot of cool POV and behind the scenes content this summer at our shows with these glasses so…

Read more

Our summer concert schedule is out! But stay tuned…there are even more shows to be added! Can't wait to party with you all this summer!

Palm Springs and beyond! Come and celebrate the new year with your favourite 50s & 60s party band at the fabulous The Westin Rancho Mirage! We're so excited about this show and we want to party with all of you…

Read more

Thank you so much to On The Red Carpet ABC7 for featuring us in their segment today! WATCH THE FULL CLIP HERE. Our casino residency continues in November with the following dates:

NOVEMBER 4 - “The Day The Music…

Read more

We're very excited to announce that we are now working with the LA-based Allive Agency exclusively for our bookings! We're happy to be a part of the roster and we're looking forward to a BIG 2024!

"KEEP IT DREAMY" Episode 5 (the season finale of our docu-series) is here! In this final episode, we get our California lineup up to speed with the songs and dance steps. We also tell the full story about going on…

Read more

“Heartbreak Hotel” live from the Cascade Lounge in Palm Springs, California the other night! Thank you so much to everyone that came out and partied with us!

We just released a new music video for the acoustic version of “Make You Mine” off of our latest album, “Sweet Nothings” – filmed by Eric Soto in our backyard in Desert Hot Springs, California. Enjoy!

We're very excited to announce the release of the official music video for our NEW single "Sweet Nothings," which features footage from the past few months of us playing shows out in California.

This video is a testament to the…

Read more

Episode 4 of our docu-series, "Keep it Dreamy" is here! In this episode, we come back from the holidays in Canada and settle into 2023. Our new manager, Demetrius Nath, comes to California to help form our plan for the…

Read more

Our NEW ALBUM entitled "Sweet Nothings" will be released on April 14! There are seven songs on the album, all recorded over the past year in California by Justin Zoltek at Steal! Records! We can't wait to share our new…

Read more

We had an amazing February, performing at lots of gigs, including Modernism Week in Palm Springs! We're excited for March, where we'll be releasing a new single and a new episode of our web series, Keep it Dreamy. Plus, we…

Read more

We’re bringing the heat this Valentine's Day with our brand new music video for our song, “Lights Down Low”! This SULTRY visual is the perfect way to celebrate the holiday of love, and we're really excited to share it with…

Read more

We just released Episode 3 of our docu-series, “Keep it Dreamy” You can catch the full episode on our YouTube channel or by clicking the video below! ENJOY!

Hey everyone! Season TWO of our web series, "Keep it Dreamy!" is out! This series documents all of the ups and downs that we experience as a Canadian band in California. You can catch up on all of the episodes…

Read more

Our show at the Palm Desert, CA. Civic Center Amphitheater was a blast! Thanks so much to everyone that came out! Check out this incredible moment from our set!

Our first podcast episode is out now! Listen to the inaugural episode of "That's That!" on Spotify (LINK HERE) or watch & listen on YouTube (LINK HERE)! We recorded this in the living room of a friend's place in…

Read more

Wow! Check out this article about us in the Coachella Valley Independent! Ritchie did a great interview and talks about how & why we moved out to California earlier this year! Thank you Matt King for the great article! READ…

Read more

Back on April 29th of this year, we performed a milestone show in our hometown of Mississauga, Ontario at the Living Arts Centre! We just released a NEW video in our Raw & Uncut series documenting the entire day! A…

Read more

Thank you so much to the Living Arts Centre and the Burlington Performing Arts Centre (below) for two incredible nights! Our hometown show in Mississauga, ON. was very important to us and we really felt the love. The Burlington, ON…
